item.title: Subtree With Maximum Average
item.description: Given a binary tree, find the subtree with maximum average. Return the root of the subtree. It’s guaranteed that there is only one subtree with maximum average. Example Given a binary tree: 1 / \ -5 11 / \ / \ 1 2 4 -2 return the node 11. Solution public class Solution { private class ResultType { public int sum, size; public ResultType(int sum, int size) { this.
